snippet: Regulators approved Pfizer’s Xeljanz treatment, which is now poised to compete with Abbott Laboratories’ top-selling Humira.
abstract: Regulators approve Pfizer's Xeljanz treatment for rheumatoid arthritis, one of company's potentially most lucrative experimental drugs; approval means Pfizer is now poised to compete with Abbott Laboratories' top-selling Humira.
lead_paragraph: Regulators approved Pfizer’s Xeljanz treatment, which is now poised to compete with Abbott Laboratories’ top-selling Humira.

headline.main: F.D.A. Clears a Pfizer Treatment for Rheumatoid Arthritis
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Clears a Pfizer Treatment for Rheumatoid Arthritis
